title: Technical Operations Specialist
full_description: FAR Government, Inc. (FARGOV) headquartered in Stafford, VA., is a premier, economically disadvantaged woman-owned Small Business that provides federal professional services, primarily engaged in providing advanced information technology, cyber security, management systems support, as well as business and infrastructure management services.We are among the most innovative, respected and ethical providers of technology solutions to the United States government. Our mission is to provide superior-quality, innovative, information technology solutions that help federal agencies best aid, serve and protect the American people.Requirements: Bachelor's degree from an accredited college or university minimum of ten years of subject matter related work experience (i.e., law enforcement and military, with a major portion of this experience in the explosives and investigative operations arena) -preferred. A high school education with a diploma or a GED equivalency certificate and 15 years of general law enforcement or field related experience.A Graduate degree.minimum of 5 years working, instructing, or conducting research in the subject area at a level exceeding the students to be taught.Duties:Intermediate to advanced knowledge of Information Technologies.Provide technical support for clients and customers.Provide real-time network system support to internal and if needed external customers.Evaluate technical specifications for business requirements to develop and implement efficient, cost-effective solutions.Serve as a liaison between the business and technical support staff when and as needed.Document and track technical support issues through databases.Setup, Configuration, and troubleshooting of hardware and software.Deliver exceptional customer service with an understanding of the organization's products and services.Training new employees as they start working with us.Familiarity with network security best practices and standards.Why FAR Government?You can take pride in working for a company dedicated to serving our government by providing the best, most cost-effective solutions for the US Government. Our work helps the US Government secure our nation, support the efforts of our military and intelligence communities, and provide lifesaving medical services to our soldiers, vets, and their families.Please submit your most up-to-date resume. Please be sure to highlight your relevant experience.FAR Government is an equal opportunity employer and encourages all qualified candidates to apply.
